body: Vishkanyas are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. Vishkanyas have the following racial traits.
name: Vishkanya

sections.body: Vishkanyas are graceful and elegant, but often irrational.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, +2 Charisma, -2 Wisdom

sections.body: Vishkanyas can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.
sections.name: Low-Light Vision

sections.body: Vishkanyas receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.
sections.name: Keen Senses

sections.body: Vishkanyas gain a +2 racial bonus on Escape Artist and Stealth checks.
sections.name: Limber

sections.body: A vishkanya has a racial bonus on saves against poison equal to its Hit Dice.
sections.name: Poison Resistance

sections.body: Vishkanyas are always proficient with blowguns, kukri, and shuriken.
sections.name: Weapon Familiarity

sections.body: Vishkanyas begin play speaking Common and Vishkanya. Vishkanyas with high Intelligence scores can choose any of the following bonus languages: Aklo, Draconic, Elven, Goblin, Sylvan, and Undercommon.
sections.name: Languages
